    Detect the most suitable ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder based on the classpath.

    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder<T>
    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.of(Class<T> requestFactoryType)
    Return a new ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder for the given requestFactoryType.
    static <T extends ClientHttpRequestFactory>
    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder<T>
    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.of(Supplier<T> requestFactorySupplier)
    Return a new ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder from the given supplier, using reflection to ultimately apply the HttpClientSettings.

    Return a new ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder that applies the given customizer to the ClientHttpRequestFactory after it has been built.

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilderCustomizer<B extends ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder<?>>
    Customizer that can be used to modify the auto-configured ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder when its type matches.

    Description
    static WebServiceMessageSenderFactory
    WebServiceMessageSenderFactory.http(ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder<?> requestFactoryBuilder, @Nullable HttpClientSettings clientSettings)
    Returns a factory that will create a ClientHttpRequestMessageSender backed by a ClientHttpRequestFactory created from the given ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.
